Aerial Bomb.name: Aerial Bomb
Aerial Bomb.description: An aerial bomb is a type of explosive or incendiary weapon intended to travel through the air on a predictable trajectory, usually designed to be dropped from an aircraft.

Skyrocket.name: SkyRocket
Skyrocket.description: A skyrocket is a type of firework that uses a solid-fuel rocket to rise quickly into the sky.

Bottle Rocket.name: Bottle Rocket
Bottle Rocket.description: A bottle rocket is a very small skyrocket.

Cherry Bomb.name: Cherry Bomb
Cherry Bomb.description: A cherry bomb is an approximately spherical exploding firework.

Xxplosive.name: Xxplosive
Xxplosive.description: This Xxplosive is the bomb diggity.
